title.narrative: Core contribution to The New Humanitarian, 2021-2023

description.narrative: Supporting The New Humanitarian in its work to contribute to more effective and accountable humanitarian action that improves the lives of people affected.

Supporting The New Humanitarian in its work to contribute to more effective and accountable humanitarian action that improves the lives of people affected.
Denmark’s support contributes to the objective of The New Humanitarian: To contribute to more effective and accountable humanitarian action that improves the lives of people affected by (1) Informing decision-makers and practitioners in the humanitarian and related sectors; (2) Providing accountability and transparency; (3) Raising awareness among wider audiences. The New Humanitarian does this by putting independent journalism at the service of the millions of people affected by humanitarian crises around the world.
The partner’s results description and results frameworks are global, general, and highly aggregated and the MFA core contribution is thus reflected in the overall results reporting by the partner. Please refer to the hyperlink below.
https://www.thenewhumanitarian.org/content/about-us
